code:
var useNotification=function useNotification(title,option){if(!("Notification"in window)){return;}if(Notification.permission!=="granted"){try{Notification.requestPermission().then(function(permission){if(permission!=='granted')return;});}catch(error){if(error instanceof TypeError){Notification.requestPermission(function(permission){if(permission!=='granted')return;});}else{console.error(error);}}}else{var notification=new Notification(title,option);notification.onclick=function(event){event.preventDefault();window.focus();// notificationRef.close(); 
};}};export default useNotification;
